titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of certain hydroelectric projects located in the State of West Virginia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 3/29/2001--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend for three consecutive two-year periods the time period required for commencement of construction of specified hydroelectric projects in the State of West Virginia.
